about_the_game:
Roll into action and lead a lovable band of Rolandos through this delightful puzzle platformer! Join forces with the wall-climbing Spikey Commandos, the slumbering King Edward, the hapless Prince Gladstone, and the enigmatic Figmento, leveraging their unique abilities and combining their skills to traverse the kaleidoscope of challenges you encounter.


The Rolando Kingdom brims with powerful "Spirit Objects" - special devices that grant you direct control to aid your adventure. Unleash bomb-cannons, harness light beams, construct magical bridges, manipulate fans, and take charge of elevators to support your Rolandos on their noble quest.


You’ll encounter offer a huge variety of ways to play: from action-packed platforming as you leap across treacherous chasms and blast your way through rock formations, to captivating puzzle-solving, secret-hunting and the joy of shepherding snoozing Royalty.


Immerse yourself in the vibrant and charming world brought to life by Finnish artist, Mikko Walamies. As you encounter the delightful and curious characters, you won’t be able to help smiling.


Traverse every corner of the enchanting Rolando Kingdom on a heroic quest to rescue the wise sages from the clutches of the Shadows. From the sun-kissed hills of Honeycup Meadows to the ominous depths of Shadow Valley, each world presents a unique experience and a new set of challenges. Let’s roll!

short_description: Control a team of unique rolling characters in this delightful puzzle-platformer. Use each Rolando's special abilities and powerful gadgets such as bomb cannons, catapults, elevators, and magical bridges to solve puzzles, shepherd sleeping royalty and traverse action-packed environments.
